meanings.sent1: The fountain of youth is said to possess unageing properties.
meanings.sent2: She had an unageing beauty that seemed to defy time.
meanings.sent3: The painting of the family remained unageing, unlike the real members who aged.
meanings.sent4: His love for her was like an unageing flame, never dimming with time.
meanings.sent5: The unageing oak tree stood tall and strong, unaffected by the passing years.

meanings.definition: Remaining youthful or unchanged in appearance
meanings.sent1: The actress had an unageing charm that captivated audiences.
meanings.sent2: Despite the years, her smile remained unageing and radiant.
meanings.sent3: The unageing portrait on the wall seemed to wink mischievously at visitors.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter echoed through the room, unageing and infectious.
meanings.sent5: The unageing melody of the song brought back memories of youth and joy.

meanings.definition: Immune to the effects of aging
meanings.sent1: The elixir was rumored to grant unageing powers to those who drank it.
meanings.sent2: Legends spoke of a mystical creature with unageing abilities.
meanings.sent3: The unageing rock band continued to rock the stage like they were immortal.
meanings.sent4: Her unageing mind was sharp and clear, unaffected by time's passage.
meanings.sent5: The unageing warrior stood proudly, untouched by the years of battle.
